  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    annotate.df()
    Annotate data.frame
    betamix.2d()
    Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model
    betamix.3d()
    Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model
    betamix.4d()
    Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model
    betamix.img()
    Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model
    connect.components()
    Connected components in an array
    get_centroid()
    Get centroid of a value in an array
    get_k_long_labels()
    Gets k-long values
    get_size()
    Get size of a value in an array
    last_ind()
    Subset based on last dimension
    list2nifti()
    Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object
    make.overlay()
    Make Overlay
    make_cell_df()
    Create dataframe for a value in an array
    median(<filtering.3d>)
    Median filter a 3D image
    median(<filtering.4d>)
    Median filter a 4D image
    median(<filtering>)
    Median filter an image
    post.process.df()
    Postprocceses a data.frame that is the result of track.components
    threshold.2d()
    Threshold a 2D image
    threshold.3d()
    Threshold a 3D image
    threshold.4d()
    Threshold a 4D image
    threshold.img()
    Threshold an image
    track.components()
    Track connected components in 4D array
